description:
This market will resolve to the CS2 content creator (primarily known for CS2/Counter-Strike 2) that HaiX (https://www.youtube.com/@HaiX) explicitly exposes for cheating (e.g., aim assistance, wallhacks, exploits, scripting, skin changer, or similar in CS2) in his upcoming youtube video.

If the video is released but exposes no qualifying CS2 content creator, or is not released by January 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If the exposed creator is not among the listed market options, the market will resolve to “Other”

If multiple qualifying CS2 content creators are exposed in the video, the market will resolve to the one whose name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source will be the official video on HaiX's YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/@HaiX) verified by title, description, content, and timestamps. Secondary sources include HaiX's X posts (https://x.com/KingHaiX) linking to or describing the video.

events.title: Which content creator will HaiX expose for cheating in his new video?

question: Will FURI get exposed for cheating?
